levels.description: Fire an incendiary grenade at the target, creating a burning zone in the 4 adjacent tiles around the target that lasts for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time:0}</> seconds. The burning zone deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage every second to enemies within; Tachanka ignores <@ba.vup>{def_penetrate_fixed}</> DEF when attacking enemies within the burning zone
